oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of winter conditions upon phytoplankton production in North-Western parts of the Mediterranean Sea
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Finenko, Z
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: MED, Western Mediterranean
Geographical distribution
Seasonal variations
Biomass
Vertical distribution
Winter
Phytoplankton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The investigations have been done with the aim of determining the effect of winter conditions upon the spatial distribution of phytoplankton in the areas featured by different convectional mixing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Actes de colloques. Ifremer. Brest [ACTES COLLOQ. IFREMER.]. 1984
